sentences.sentence: Antibody can be linked to liposome particles by covalent binding.
sentences.translation: 抗体能通过共价键结合在脂质体颗粒上。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To study the effect of liposome suspension on the ultrastructure of rat skin.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究脂质体制剂对大鼠皮肤超微结构的影响。

sentences.sentence: OBJECTIVE: To study effect of liposome suspension on distribution of fluorescein sodium in the rat skin.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究脂质体混悬液对荧光素钠在大鼠皮肤分布的影响。
